node.postTitle: The 4 Best Dog Collars and Harnesses In 2020

postDescription.postDescription: The 4 Best Dog Collars and Harnesses In 2020 - The Most Important Collar and Harness Features, Types, and What To Buy Guide.

categoryDescription.categoryDescription: All you need to know about dog gear (recommendations and reviews) to keep your G.A.S. (Gear Aquisition Syndrome) under control.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Best Dog Collars and Harnesses 2020 - Important Collar and Harness Features

Material

Depending on the type of collar some are made of cotton, leather, some sort of steel or nylon.

While a chain collar is nice during the summer and when the dog enters the water, they are not as suited for a daily basis use.

A leather collar will last you a very long time, making it a good investment.

Harnesses, on the other hand, are made out of a combination of materials. Although you can also find good harnesses made of leather, it will cost you more money. Harnesses, when chosen wisely, will last you very long as well, so it might be worth the investment.

Depending on your dog's fur you can choose either a more protective one (with more material) or a more simple one (material is present mainly on the straps).

Width

Width is for me one of the main criteria according to which I chose the daily collar for my dog. The width I prefer is minumum 1in (2,5cm).

For the harness, I chose also a roundabout 1in (2,5cm) width for the straps.

Comfort

Make sure that the flat collar of your choice has padding all around the inside of the collar, as well as a protective flap for the buckle. I like the collars to have a separate ring for the dog tags as well.

A comfortable harness will not press on your dog's ness when he is sniffing, and will not create friction between his front legs and strap when walking or running. This means that it is more preferable to have a Y-shaped harness in the front and a good clearance for the dog's front legs.

Watch out with overheating in summer if you use a harness.

How tight should a dog collar or harness be?

After you put the collar on your dog‚Äôs neck slip two fingers between the dog‚Äôs neck and collar to ensure that it is not too tight. The same measurements I take for the harness as well.

A poorly-fitting collar can affect your dog‚Äôs eating, drinking and even breathing, which will obviously lead to catastrophic outcomes. A collar that‚Äôs to stiff (like the ones one made from untreated leather) can also cause irritation to the dog‚Äôs neck.

Best Dog Collars and Harnesses 2020 - Dog Collar and Harness Types

Choke Collars

In essence, these collars are chains that contract and expand, exerting pressure on your dog‚Äôs neck.

E-Collars

E-collars (electronic collars) deliver a mild to moderate pulse to a dog.

Martingale Collars

A martingale collar is made of two loops: one that fits around the dog‚Äôs neck and another (the control loop) that attaches to a leash. Because of this construction, it functions much like a choke collar but doesn‚Äôt put the same kind of pressure on the trachea.

Prong Collars

Prong or pinch collars are similar in design to choke collars, except instead of the links being curved and smooth, an open piece of metal extends beyond the link and pinches the dog‚Äôs neck.

Flat Collars

A flat collar is similar to a human belt. It serves well as a means to maintain positive control of your pet.

Flat collars are the most common collars worldwide. Almost every dog will wear a flat collar at some point in his life, whether during his puppy years or all the time. They come in an array of options, so it is important to choose the right one for your dog‚Äôs size and make it fit correctly.

Most of the time you will use one collar that you and your dog will accept the best. Take your time in choosing it and instead of investing in 2-3 collars, make a bigger investment in 1 good one.

Front-Clip Harness

A front-clip harness allows you to hook the leash in front of the sternum (chest bone) of the dog.

The purpose of a front clip harness is to provide you with extra control over your dog. When your dog pulls towards something, the front leash attachment point causes them to pivot around towards you the moment you pull on the leash.

Back-Clip Harness

A back-clip harness allows you to hook the leash at the back of the harness right on top of the mid-back or between the shoulder blades of your dog. The harnesses are especially useful for small dogs with delicate throats easily damaged by collars.

I have 3 circumstances when I use the above-pictured harness on my dog:

  • When I take my dog for hikes and I don‚Äôt know the terrain. It is easier to pull out a dog from a ditch by the harness than by the collar or skin.
  • When I take my dog alongside my bicycle. I don‚Äôt want to accidentally yank his neck with the bike.
  • When I have my dog in the car and I use the seatbelt option. Again I don‚Äôt want him to be yanked by his neck in case of a strong brake.

When back-clip harnesses are used with an untrained dog who likes to pull, they create a sled-pulling action, with the owner dragged along in place of the sled. And believe me, dogs are strong :-).

Top 4 Best Dog Collars and Harnesses 2020 - What Should You Buy?

For safety reasons, I will not describe nor advertise the use of the choke, electronic, martingale or prong collars. In my opinion, if you think you need to use one of the above, you should consult a professional that can show you how to work with those collars‚Ä¶ if really necessary.

I have a reactive dog as well and I only use a flat collar for our normal walks and I can still correct my dog with my voice to not react. It is because we developed a bond and relationship that allows me to do that.

Flat Collar - PawFurEver Soft & Breathable Padded Leather Dog Collar

  • 100% Genuine Leather and Comfort: PawFurEver‚Äôs handmade real leather dog collar gives your dog a stylish designer look with all the comfort that they deserve. Our heavy-duty dog collar comes in a variety of colors and sizes. Perfect for every dog breed.
  • Soft & Breathable Padding: This dog collar is built keeping your dog‚Äôs comfort in mind. The inner breathable padding of the collar makes it super comfortable for your puppy. Also, the breathable padding keeps the dog cool.
  • Padded Buckles: This extra padding protects the dog‚Äôs neck from the brass metal buckle. Another unique feature to our classic collar is the D-ring to attach your dog‚Äôs tag or nameplate.

Click Here To Buy

Flat Collar - ELITE SPANKER Puppy Dog Collar

  • Dog collar is made of high quality and durable nylon material with neat stitching and soft padded lining to prevent chafing for your dog‚Äôs skin and hair.
  • Duraflex UTX buckle is lightweight reducing the weight of the collar.
  • Magic sticker ID panel. There is an magic sticker ID panel on this training dog collar that can be foreseen with patches.
  • 3 sizes 4 colors available.

Click Here To Buy

Front-Clip Harness - ICEFANG Tactical Dog Harness

  • 2 x metal clips: one top and one on the chest.
  • It provides a good fit and is highly adjustable.
  • It comes with a top handle.
  • The harness is for heavy-duty and comes padded on the inside.
  • You can stick patches on the sides.

Click Here To Buy

Back-Clip Harness - VIVOI Tactical Dog Harness

  • The high-quality nylon material makes it breathable, and neat stitching makes it strong and durable when your dog pulling.
  • The soft padded is well padded in all pressure areas for your dog with comfort.
  • You can adjust the hook and loop until it fits your dog with comfort, the adjustable belt next to the metal buckle is the second insurance to make sure your dog can‚Äôt rip it off.
  • The control handle is designed with a rubber layer, which makes it comfortable to grab and easy to control your dog in training and daily life.
  • There are three different hook and loops that are sent for free, you can attach patches to identify your dog.

Click Here To Buy

node.postTitle: The 4 Strongest Dog Crates For Indoors In 2020 Reviews

postDescription.postDescription: When it comes to selecting your puppy‚Äôs new crate you need to take into consideration the full size of your dog when he/she will be an adult.

categoryDescription.categoryDescription: All you need to know about dog gear (recommendations and reviews) to keep your G.A.S. (Gear Aquisition Syndrome) under control.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Whether you have a puppy or an adult dog, you should choose a crate that is large enough for him/her to stand up comfortably, turn around inside the crate, and lay down comfortably as a full-sized adult.

Also consider the fact that you might need or want to crate the dog when while you are not at home, and it is imperative for the dog to have clean water during those hours. This is will be another influencing detail when choosing the size of the crate.

One very good accessory for a crate is the crate cover. Crate covers have the benefit of providing a more den-like feeling, since the crate is less exposed on three sides and allows your dog to actually enjoy being in his own cozy, safe little hideaway and will often choose to go there for naps, to chew on his favorite toy, or to get away from the noise/fuss of visitors, etc.

The crate must have a fixed spot in your house. This spot must not be an isolated spot from the rest of the house, because this will give the dog the message that crating is negative since he/she will be isolated far away from the loved ones. At the same time, the spot should not be in a busy, noisy kitchen either. If it is too noisy the dog can‚Äôt find peace and quiet for his/her nappies and recharge.

Dog Crate Sizes

Extra Small

This crate size is usable for dogs that will grow as high as about 22in (56cm). Extra small dogs from the Toy Dogs Group can fit well in this crate size: Chihuahua, Yorkshire Terrier, Affenpinscher, Biewer Terrier, etc.

Small

This crate size is usable for dogs that will grow as high as about 24in (60cm). Small dogs mainly from the Toy Dogs Group can fit well in this crate size: Maltese, Bichon Frise, Miniature Pinscher, Pugs, etc.

Medium

This crate size is usable for dogs that will grow as high as about 30in (75cm). Medium-sized dogs from the can fit well in this crate size: Bulldogs, Dachshund, etc.

Intermediate

This crate size is usable for dogs that will grow as high as about 36in (91cm). Intermediate-sized dogs from the can fit well in this crate size: Bull Terriers, Beagles, etc.

Large

This crate size is usable for dogs that will grow as high as about 42in (105cm). Large-sized dogs from the can fit well in this crate size: Australian Shepherds, Border Collies, Dalmatians, Retrievers, etc.

Extra Large

This crate size is usable for dogs that will grow as high as about 48in (120cm). Extra large-sized dogs from the can fit well in this crate size: German Shepherds, Belgian Malinois, Huskies, Akitas, etc.

Always give more space for your dog than the measurements given by the breed information.

Home Dog Crate Types

Basic Wire Crate

Most of the times home crates are a basic wire dog crate or a crate that looks like furniture and it will not be used for traveling.

A basic wire crate is usually collapsible and can easily be transported if you need to take your crate with you. Wire crates are bulky and not adapted to a car‚Äôs design, so most probably will not fit in a regular, medium-sized car.

Soft-Sided Dog Crate

This type of dog kennel isn‚Äôt for every dog. They are usually made of canvas or nylon and are therefore more destructible than wire or plastic crates. They‚Äôre also more difficult to clean, can be easy for curious pups to escape from, or destructive animals to chew through.

But there are also several pros for soft-sided crates: they‚Äôre lightweight, great for travel, and can be stored easily.

Heavy-Duty Dog Crate

This type of crate is commonly marketed for giant breed dogs, dogs who destroy their crates, or for master crate escape artists.

The con of this type of crate is the price mainly, but it pays off if this is the only way to keep your puppy safe.

Furniture Dog Crates

Also known as fashion crates, the wood or rattan finish of these crates certainly looks the best of all these options around the house, and some can even double as a side table, being somewhat functional too.

The downside is that these are not suitable for destructive dogs.

Our Top 4 Picks

Basic Wire Crate - AmazonBasics Single Door & Double Door Folding Metal Dog Crate

  • Dog crate with double-door design for convenient front and side entry.
  • Two slide-bolt door latches for increased safety and security.
  • Folds flat for easy storage/portability with sturdy metal construction.
  • Designed with mini dividers (.81 cm between each bar) on the bottom perimeter to prevent paws from slipping through.
  • Optional divider panel and removable composite plastic pan included.
  • Available in various sizes.

Check Price On Amazon

Soft-Sided Dog Crate - EliteField 3-Door Folding Soft Dog Crate

  • The crate frame is made of strong steel tube; the crate cover is made of high quality durable 600D fabric and hex mesh fabric; a well ventilated, stylish, lightweight and durable crate.
  • Three mesh doors (on the top, front, and side) for convenience and for sunlight and breathability; two accessory pockets on the top and side; removable and washable cover and bed.
  • Free carrying bag and fleece bed included; a handle and hand carrying straps on the crate, hand carrying straps and adjustable padded shoulder strap on the carrying bag allow for many carrying options; folded crate with just 3‚Äù height for easy transport and storage.
  • Available in different sizes.

Check Price On Amazon

Heavy-Duty Dog Crate - LUCKUP Heavy Duty Strong Metal Crate

  • Heavy-duty frame: made from rust and corrosion-resistant steel, strong and durable, hard to be damaged, nontoxic finished surface keeps your dog healthy and render excellent anti-rust ability.
  • Suitable for most medium and large dogs, it has two locks with the safety buckles to prevent the dogs from opening the door and escaping.
  • Double door & locking caster design: a front door and a top door.
  • It comes with 360 degrees rotated locking casters that can help you to move the crate anywhere easily and lock the wheels to keep the crate in place.
  • Easy to assemble: all hardware pack included, just need to fit it with four wheels and eight screw bolts, locks were pre-assembled. It only takes 3-5 minutes to complete.
  • Easy to clean: removable (slide-out) plastic tray helps you to catch the fallen dog food or dirt, and allows you to wipe and clean easily.

Check Price On Amazon

Furniture Dog Crates - Casual Home Wooden Pet Crate

  • End table design gives this pet crate a native feel that blends in easily.
  • This furniture crate is very easy to assemble and it is made of solid wood for increased durability and longevity.
  • It comes with a lockable gate for your peace of mind.
  • The end table style top provides additional storage space.
  • This crate is more suitable for small dog breeds.

node.postTitle: The 4 Best Dog Leashes In 2020 Review

postDescription.postDescription: A leash (also called a lead, lead line) is your main mean to control your dog by attaching it to a collar or harness while others go directly around the dog's neck.

categoryDescription.categoryDescription: All you need to know about dog gear (recommendations and reviews) to keep your G.A.S. (Gear Aquisition Syndrome) under control.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Best Dog Leashes In 2020 - Important Leash Features

Here is what to consider when selecting a leash for your dog:

Length

The most common leash length is 6 ft (1,8m). This is a happy medium length that gives your dog some space to roam but isn‚Äôt so long that it‚Äôs hard to keep your dog close. If you usually walk your dog on busy city streets, a shorter 4 ft (1m) option is preferable, as it‚Äôs easier to keep your dog close. Long 10 or 15 ft (3m or 5m) leashed are best suited to walking in parks or on hiking trails.

Width

The wider the leash, the stronger it is, so make sure you choose a leash wide enough for the size of your dog. A half-inch (1cm) leash might be fine for walking small dogs but look for an option of at least an inch (2,5cm) wide from medium or large dogs.

Comfort

Hold it, try it and you will feel what is right for you. For me, an inch (2,5cm) wide leash feels better than the slip lead I own simply because of the material it is made of. I like sturdy materials, that don‚Äôt get slippery and cut into my hand if they get wet.

Best Dog Leashes In 2020 - Types of Dog Leashes

Standard Leashes

Standard leashes have a loop handle at one end and a metal clip at the other end to attach to your dog's collar. These leashes are intended to use on a daily basis and during training.

Typically available in lengths from 4 to 8 ft (approx. 1 - 2,5m). I personally use a standard 8ft (2,5m) leash only when I go out for potty purposes with my dog. I use a 4ft (1m) leash for our city walks.

Standard leashes are most commonly flat. Flat leashes come in various widths, usually getting wider and thicker for larger and stronger dogs.

Tow Leashes

Important and effective when you want to teach your dog to walk off-leash. Tow leashes are similar to standard leashes just much longer 16 to 32 ft (5-10m), so pick whatever you feel comfortable with. Some may have a loop handle some may not.

Adjustable Leashes

Adjustable leashes have one or multiple loops along the leash that allows a clasp to shorten or lengthen the leash.

You may want to use an adjustable leash to wrap it around your waist or torso. Commonly used by those owners that jog with their dogs.

Slip Leads for Dogs

Slip leads are two-in-one collar and leash. The leash loops onto itself and goes over the dog‚Äôs head.

If your dog pulls on the leash, the collar part will tighten. This can be dangerous since it can suffocate your dog if it tightens up too much, similar to choke collars. Also, be aware that your dog may be able to loosen the area around the neck and slip out. It‚Äôs important for a dog to wear a separate collar with identification when using a slip lead if this is your daily leash.

Retractable Leashes

A retractable leash is made of the plastic handle that allows a thin length of cord to wraps around a spring-loaded device housed inside. It works similar to the measuring tapes. A button on the handle controls the amount of cord that extends.

I always will tell you to throw the Flexi line in the bin and get a standard good leash and it will serve you well in all situations. Why would you have a leash at which your dog can pull? So not only he is leading you but your dog also learns leash = pulling and be the leader. This might be worse leash you could own honestly. Sorry if someone‚Äôs feelings are hurt, but there is no grey zone with dogs.

The 4 Best Dog Leashes In 2020 - What Should You Buy?

Standard Leash - The Julius K9 Super Grip

  • Made from strong and durable but comfortable to hold material.
  • Easy to hold and it will not become slippery when wet.
  • Rubber threads are woven into the material to ensure an optimal.
  • Available in a range of lengths, with or without handle, and in various colors.

Tow Leash - Vivifying Dog Training Lead

  • This leash features a soft padded handle and makes it feel good in the hand.
  • The 20ft (6m) leash is used for helping you train the recall of your dog without the dog running off.

<a href=‚Äòhttps://amzn.to/2o1qLK3' target='_blank' rel='noopener nofollow' class='btn btn__primary‚Äô>Click Here To Buy

Adjustable Leash - Dogs My Love 6-Way European Multi-Functional Dog Leash

  • Made of strong and very durable, 100% natural, ecological cotton tape.
  • Features strong nickel plated durable swivel snaps and rings.
  • Adjustments can be made from either end of the leash.

Slip Lead - Friends Forever Extremely Durable Dog Slip Rope Leash

node.postTitle: The 3 Best Dog Travel Crates In 2020 Review

postDescription.postDescription: Whether you opt to use a dog car crate or some other kind of dog car restraint, your dog needs to be secure while you‚Äôre driving or traveling.

categoryDescription.categoryDescription: All you need to know about dog gear (recommendations and reviews) to keep your G.A.S. (Gear Aquisition Syndrome) under control.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
In the event of an accident, your dog will become an instant projectile, flying through the windshield and injuring you, other passengers, and themselves.

Having an unrestrained dog in your car often results in distracted driving. Using a restraint will keep both you and your dog safer.

Dog Crate Sizes

Extra Small

This crate size is usable for dogs that will grow as high as about 22in (56cm). Extra small dogs from the Toy Dogs Group can fit well in this crate size: Chihuahua, Yorkshire Terrier, Affenpinscher, Biewer Terrier, etc.

Small

This crate size is usable for dogs that will grow as high as about 24in (60cm). Small dogs mainly from the Toy Dogs Group can fit well in this crate size: Maltese, Bichon Frise, Miniature Pinscher, Pugs, etc.

Medium

This crate size is usable for dogs that will grow as high as about 30in (75cm). Medium-sized dogs from the can fit well in this crate size: Bulldogs, Dachshund, etc.

Intermediate

This crate size is usable for dogs that will grow as high as about 36in (91cm). Intermediate-sized dogs from the can fit well in this crate size: Bull Terriers, Beagles, etc.

Large

This crate size is usable for dogs that will grow as high as about 42in (105cm). Large-sized dogs from the can fit well in this crate size: Australian Shepherds, Border Collies, Dalmatians, Retrievers, etc.

Extra Large

This crate size is usable for dogs that will grow as high as about 48in (120cm). Extra large-sized dogs from the can fit well in this crate size: German Shepherds, Belgian Malinois, Huskies, Akitas, etc.

Always give more space for your dog than the measurements given by the breed information.

Dog Travel Crate Types

Foldable Fabric Crates

These crates are most appropriate for very small breeds and small puppies, especially if you‚Äôre going to be taking your pet as a carry-on on an airplane or they will be traveling with you when you run errands. If you have a heavy chewer, be sure to inspect your fabric crate each time you use it to make sure that there are no weak spots or tears where your dog could escape.

Plastic Dog Crates aka Plastic Flight Kennel

As the name says, this panel is mainly made of plastic with a wired door. If you are planning an air travel, make sure that the crate you choose is approved for flight use.

Heavy-Duty Dog Crates

Made out of aluminum, these crates are sturdier and provide better protection for your dog. If you have a heavy chewer than a heavy-duty crate is the answer.
